# insertionIndex

**Type Property**

Returns the index at which you should insert the object in order to maintain a sorted array.

## Declaration

```swift
static var insertionIndex: NSBinarySearchingOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **firstEqual**: Specifies that the search should return the first object in the range that is equal to the given object.
- **lastEqual**: Specifies that the search should return the last object in the range that is equal to the given object.

items.description: Specifies that the search should return the first object in the range that is equal to the given object.
items.name: firstEqual

items.description: Specifies that the search should return the last object in the range that is equal to the given object.
